full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGAGS KYI BKLAG THABS BSDUS PA'I 'GREL PA MTHONG BA DON GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES PA SNGAGS KYI BKLAG THABS BSDUS PA'I t'IKKA MTHONG BA DON GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNAR THANG PAn CHEN SAm BHA SHR'IS, BLO DMAN RNAMS KYI DON DU DPAL RTZE THANG GI CHOS GRVA CHEN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU LEGS PAR SBYAR BA RE ZHIG RDZOGS SO, ,'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA LA PHAN PA MTHA' YAS PA 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,) SMRAS PA, 'PHAGS YUL MKHAS PA'I BZHED SROL BZHIN, ,LEGS SBYAR SKAD KYI KLOG TSUL 'DI, ,GSANG SNGAGS BZLAS BRJOD BYED PA LA, ,NYER MKHO GCES PA'I CHA LAG TU, ,MTHONG NAS LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, ,DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BZOD PA YIS, ,CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM DU, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SKYE 'GRO KUN, ,SGRA SBYOR SNGAGS KYI BKLAG TSUL RNAMS, ,MA NOR JI BZHIN LEGS RTOGS NAS, ,MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB 'THOB GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
